item.description:
It is getting cold outside so let's stay indoor to play this ancient Chinese gambling game. A short instruction/refresher will be given to the beginner players. The format will be based on the traditional 13 tiles format.

In addition to the $2 Meetup fees, there will be a buy-in fees to enter the tournament. Each player in the beginner group will pay a $2 buy-in fee to enter the tournament. The Intermediate/Advanced group will have a $10 buy-in (or higher if players agree). Please indicate your MJ skill so I can pair up people in similar level. As a rule of thumb, you should rate yourself a beginner if you don't know how to count score.

The event will take place from 3:30 to 6:30pm so please make sure you can COMMIT FOR 3 HOURS before you register. The game is in 4 some format so you cannot come late or leave early as you will affect three other players.

Good luck!

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Mahjong Championship
